sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.content: Please read the FAQ before contacting me. You may find the answers to your questions here.

sections.title: How to use this website?
sections.content: This website is a portfolio showcasing my work. You can navigate through the pages using the navigation menu at the top.

sections.title: How to contact you?
sections.content: You can contact me through the contact form available on the website or by sending an email to my address.

sections.title: Where can I find your stuff?
sections.content: You can find my artwork and other projects in the 'ART GALLERY' and 'IT PROJECTS' pages of the website. Each page has information explaining about it's contents.
